original_text: together with all the Arabah on the east side of the Jordan as far as the Sea of the Arabah, under the slopes of Pisgah.
korean_text: 요단 이쪽 곧 그 동쪽 온 아라바니 비스가 기슭 아래 아라바의 바다까지이니라

sentences.original_text: together with all the Arabah on the east side of the Jordan
as far as the Sea of the Arabah
